Package com.dryver.Controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ElasticSearchController
    Used to communicate with the Elasticsearch server follows the Songleton design pattern.
    ElasticSearchController.AddRequestTask
    A class for getting the list of requests associated with a rider on the Elastic Search server
    ElasticSearchController.AddUserTask
    Adds a user to the database.
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteRequestTask
    A class for deleting a request by it's ElasticSearch ID
    ElasticSearchController.DeleteUserTask
    Deletes a user in the database based on the user id.
    ElasticSearchController.GetAllRequestsTask  
    ElasticSearchController.GetRequestsTask  
    ElasticSearchController.GetRequestTask
    Adds a request to the ElasticSearch server
    ElasticSearchController.GetUsersTask
    Used to get a list of users.
    ElasticSearchController.GetUserTask
    Gets a user based on the users' user id asynchronously
    ElasticSearchController.UpdateRequestTask  
    RequestListAdapter
    A custom Array Adapter for listing requests as strings properly.
    RequestSingleton
    Request Singleton.
    UserController
    Controller for the Current user, as well as the user currently being viewed.
